mapper.insert: insert into Log (UserID, Time, Operation,Result) values (#{UserID},#{Time},#{Operation},#{Result})
mapper.select: select top(#{end}-#{begin}+1) [Log].LogID,[Log].UserID,[Log].Time,[Log].Operation,[Log].Result,[User].UserName,[User].LoginName from [Log],[User] where [Log].UserID = [User].UserID and [Log].LogID not in(select top(#{begin}-1) LogID from [Log])
